objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#D9C0A3;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#BF9270;stop-opacity:1' /></linearGradient><linearGradient id='sideGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#F2E8DC;stop-opacity:1' /><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#F2E8DC;stop-opacity:0' /></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)' /><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='url(#sideGradient)' /><g opacity='0.3'><path d='M50,150 L150,150 L150,250 L50,250 Z' fill='#E6C9A8' /><path d='M100,300 L200,300 L200,400 L100,400 Z' fill='#D1A77D' /><path d='M80,500 L180,500 L180,600 L80,600 Z' fill='#E6C9A8' /><path d='M120,700 L220,700 L220,800 L120,800 Z' fill='#D1A77D' /><path d='M60,900 L160,900 L160,1000 L60,1000 Z' fill='#E6C9A8' /></g><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='800' cy='200' r='40' fill='#D4AF7A' /><circle cx='900' cy='350' r='30' fill='#D4AF7A' /><circle cx='750' cy='500' r='35' fill='#D4AF7A' /><circle cx='850' cy='650' r='25' fill='#D4AF7A' /><circle cx='950' cy='800' r='40' fill='#D4AF7A' /></g><path d='M540,0 L540,1080' stroke='#D4AF7A' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5' /></svg>

objects.text:
• Spaciously stylish with ample storage
• Durable faux leather construction
• Gold-tone hardware & charm details

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and elegant design aimed at promoting a fashion product. The left half sports a soft gradient background transitioning from beige to a light tan, creating a warm, classy mood. Decorative geometric elements in semi-transparent rectangles and circles add depth to the background. The right half presents a stylish handbag image prominently, cropped and scaled for visual balance.

There are multiple text layers: a large bold title (`heading`) placed near the top-left, a smaller serif subheading (`subheading`) beneath it, and a list of product attributes in bullet points (`description`). The price is highlighted in large digits (`price`) just above a prominent call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`).

The color palette consists of:
- Warm Beige: #D9C0A3
- Rich Tan: #BF9270
- Deep Brown: #5D4037
- Accent Gold: #D4AF7A
- Soft Cream: #F2E8DC
- Pure White: #FFFFFF

This layout effectively draws attention to the product while maintaining a clean, luxurious look.
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish handbag made primarily in a soft, sophisticated warm tan color (#B47B5A). The textured leather surface adds a subtle richness, enhancing the material’s tactile quality. Gold metallic accents (#D4AF37), including the hardware and decorative charms, add luxury and contrast beautifully against the matte tan backdrop. The colors are harmoniously blended, with the tan providing a grounded, elegant base, while the gold elements pop without overwhelming the simplicity of the design. For an advertisement banner, a palette of Tan (#B47B5A), Gold (#D4AF37), Cream (#F5F5DC), and Deep Brown (#4E3629) can create a refined, modern aesthetic.
